quizDescription: Test your knowledge and skills for the Microsoft Certified Solutions Expert (MCSE) certification with this challenging quiz!
quizTags: MCSE, Microsoft Certification, Information Technology, IT Professionals

questions.question: Which MCSE certification focuses on designing, building, and managing effective and innovative cloud solutions using Microsoft Azure?
questions.explanation: MCSE: Cloud Platform and Infrastructure certification focuses on designing, building, and managing cloud solutions using Microsoft Azure.

questions.question: What is the prerequisite certification for MCSE: Core Infrastructure?
questions.explanation: The prerequisite certification for MCSE: Core Infrastructure is MCSA: Windows Server 2019.

questions.question: Which MCSE certification focuses on data management and analytics using SQL Server?
questions.explanation: MCSE: Data Management and Analytics certification focuses on data management and analytics using SQL Server.

questions.question: What is the prerequisite certification for MCSE: Productivity?
questions.explanation: The prerequisite certification for MCSE: Productivity is MCSA: Office 365.

questions.question: Which MCSE certification focuses on managing and securing devices in an enterprise environment?
questions.explanation: MCSE: Mobility certification focuses on managing and securing devices in an enterprise environment.

questions.question: Which MCSE certification validates expertise in Windows Server 2016?
questions.explanation: MCSE: Core Infrastructure certification validates expertise in Windows Server 2016.

questions.question: What is the prerequisite certification for MCSE: Cloud Platform and Infrastructure?
questions.explanation: The prerequisite certification for MCSE: Cloud Platform and Infrastructure is MCSA: Windows Server 2016.

questions.question: Which MCSE certification focuses on managing Office 365 and productivity solutions?
questions.explanation: MCSE: Productivity certification focuses on managing Office 365 and productivity solutions.

questions.question: What is the prerequisite certification for MCSE: Data Management and Analytics?
questions.explanation: The prerequisite certification for MCSE: Data Management and Analytics is MCSA: SQL Server 2016.

questions.question: Which MCSE certification focuses on modern desktop deployment, management, and security?
questions.explanation: MCSE: Modern Desktop Administrator certification focuses on modern desktop deployment, management, and security.

questions.question: What is the prerequisite certification for MCSE: Modern Desktop Administrator?
questions.explanation: The prerequisite certification for MCSE: Modern Desktop Administrator is MCSA: Windows 10.

questions.question: Which MCSE certification focuses on designing and implementing cloud data platform solutions?
questions.explanation: MCSE: Cloud Data Platform certification focuses on designing and implementing cloud data platform solutions.

questions.question: What is the prerequisite certification for MCSE: Cloud Data Platform?
questions.explanation: The prerequisite certification for MCSE: Cloud Data Platform is MCSA: SQL Server 2016.

questions.question: Which MCSE certification focuses on deploying and managing Windows and web services?
questions.explanation: MCSE: App Builder certification focuses on deploying and managing Windows and web services.

questions.question: What is the prerequisite certification for MCSE: App Builder?
questions.explanation: The prerequisite certification for MCSE: App Builder is MCSA: Universal Windows Platform.
